channel.title: Client upload help please
channel.description:
Ok, i'm using Try Again's SpliceScape client.
I have edited it and need to somehow get it so it can be downloaded by players via my website - www.runex-gaming.tk.
I also need it to put all the files into C:\Program Files\RuneX - and make a Desktop shortcut.
If anyone could guide me on how to do this, I would be very grateful.
Thanks alot, - RuneX -

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

K thanks.

So if I move my client files, leaving out the .java files so they can’t edit it, to C:\Program Files\RuneX (the file that I want it to be in). Will I be able to upload C:\Program Files\RuneX straight onto Megashare?

And will it make a Desktop shortcut too?

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 07:48:04 am[/size][hr]Please could somone answer my question?

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2009, 09:52:37 am[/size][hr]How do I get the download to make a Desktop shortcut?

  • RuneX -

Read full topic

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

[quote=“RuneX-Gaming, post:6, topic:261812”]Ok, on these sites when the download comes up it says

Example;

File: Game client
Size: 86mb
From: www.just-an-example.com

Also, when i try to open the file that it’s all in, it just opens up to the 20 odd files.

  • RuneX -[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2009, 04:16:34 pm[/size][hr]But when I tried to upload it then, I was uploading off My Documents.

Does it have to be in Program Files?

Btw i’ll probs rep++ for the person who helps me most.

  • RuneX -[/quote]

I’d suggest using megashare.com then using the direct link function on their site, this should give you a link like you’ve just stated

Read full topic

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

use some coding for the “Download” button

make it open the page to start the download.

and for uppit you just have to open the file that your server files are saved in when you click browse

Read full topic

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

I’ve seen on other servers, you press “Download” on their website and the Download pops straight up.

How could I do this?

Also, with uppit, do I have to move the files into C:\Program Files\RuneX on my computer?
And will that make a Desktop icon too?

  • RuneX -

Read full topic

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

go to like mediafire.com or uppit.com or any other file hosting site and upload it to that.

click move file then move it to the c:\Program Files\RuneX

Read full topic

item.title: Client upload help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Use MediaFire.Com to upload it and receive a link.
